short_definition: When a legislative body has two chambers. For example, Congress is comprised of the House of Representatives and the Senate.
long_definition_html:
When a legislative body has two chambers. For example, Congress is comprised of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

Source: Congress.gov
long_definition_markdown:
When a legislative body has two chambers. For example, Congress is comprised of the House of Representatives and the Senate.

Source: [Congress.gov](http://beta.congress.gov/help/legislative-glossary)
